title: How to Make Your Character Look Like a Classic Noob in Roblox

steps.title: Log into Roblox.
steps.content: Log into Roblox. Go to https://www.roblox.com in a web browser and enter your username and password at the top of the screen and click Log In . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click Avatar.
steps.content: Click Avatar . It's in the sidebar menu to the left.

steps.title: Remove all features from your character.
steps.content: Remove all features from your character. This includes clothes, faces, hats, hair, heads, body parts, packages, gear, etc. Look for any item that has a checkmark in the list of items and uncheck that item. [3] X Research source Not removing everything won't have the same noob effect in the end, so make sure to double-check! You can still keep your animations on, but removing them will make you look even more like a noob. Turning off Roblox R15 will also make you look more like a classic noob, but it isn't necessary.

steps.title: Click or hover your mouse over the Body tab.
steps.content: Click or hover your mouse over the Body tab. It's the third tab next to the image of your avatar.

steps.title: Click Skin Tone.
steps.content: Click Skin Tone . It's next to "Appearance" in the menu that appears below the "Body" tab.

steps.title: Scroll down and click Advanced.
steps.content: Scroll down and click Advanced . It's in the bottom-right corner of the menu with skin tone swatches. You can only access the "advanced" section of skin tones if you are on a desktop or laptop.

steps.title: Make your Head, Left Arm, and Right Arm "Bright Yellow".
steps.content: Make your Head, Left Arm, and Right Arm "Bright Yellow". Click the radio button next to "All" in the menu to the left and then click the "Bright Yellow" circle. [4] X Research source It will say "Bright yellow" when you place the mouse cursor over it.

steps.title: Make your Torso "Bright Blue".
steps.content: Make your Torso "Bright Blue". Click the radio button next to "Torso" in the menu to the left. Then click the "Bright Blue" circle. [5] X Research source It will say "Bright Blue" when you place your mouse cursor over it.

steps.title: Make your Left Leg and Right Leg "Br. yellowish green".
steps.content: Make your Left Leg and Right Leg "Br. yellowish green". Click the radio button next to "Left leg" and then select the "Br. yellowish green" circle. It will say "Br. yellowish green" when you place the mouse cursor over it. Then repeat for the right leg.

steps.title: Click Done.
steps.content: Click Done . It's at the bottom of the menu with the color swatches. You are finished. [6] X Research source Enjoy playing as a classic noob!
